page.home.title: Free genealogical tools
page.home.description: Genealogical tools designed for and by genealogists.
page.home.apps.insee.title: French register of deceased persons
page.home.apps.insee.subtitle: Deaths that occurred in France since 1970
page.home.apps.insee.description: A user friendly search engine to find information on a deceased person among 25 millions available entries.
page.home.apps.arbreomatic.title: Arbre-o-matic
page.home.apps.arbreomatic.subtitle: Genealogical fan generator
page.home.apps.arbreomatic.description: A tool to design and generate infographics from a Gedcom file.
page.home.apps.monarbre.title: Mon arbre ("My tree")
page.home.apps.monarbre.subtitle: Application to read genealogical data
page.home.apps.monarbre.description: The swiss army knife of genealogy, allows anyone to quickly open and read a Gedcom file. Currently under development.
page.insee.title: French register of deceased persons
page.insee.description: Query the database of French deceased persons since 1970. More than 25 millions entries available.
page.not_found.title: Page not found
page.not_found.explanation: The page could not be found.
page.not_found.contact: If you believe this to be an error, please write us at: {contact}
page.error.title: An error occurred
page.error.description: Unfortunately the interface crashed. Please report us the problem by sending the following code to {contact}:
